segments.text: What are your career goals , Miss Li ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see , I would like to work my way up to a senior management position with a company such as yours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! It sounds like you might be a good fit . As you know , we ’ re one of the largest brokerage houses in the world . Our daily work is quite hectic , and we , re looking for an assistant who can keep us organized ... help keep the engines running smoothly , so to speak . Our hours are long , but the overtime pay is good ... sort of makes up for the long hours .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would a typical day be like for me here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that ’ s the problem . We never seem to have ' typical ' days , but you'd spend about 30 % of your time on the computer . There would also be a lot of telephone time , setting up appointment , and taking care of a lot of support work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , I do . My present job is similar in that respect , and I think I ’ m doing a good job .
segments.speaker: S2
